dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Mount Kilimanjaro, with its three volcanic cones, is the highest mountain in Africa and a major climbing destination, located in Tanzania.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: What is the average temperature at the top?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: At the top of Mount Kilimanjaro, temperatures can drop to around -7°C (19°F) or even lower, especially at night.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: How many people climb to the top each year?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Every year, about 30,000 to 40,000 people attempt to climb to the summit of Mount Kilimanjaro.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Has it ever erupted?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Mount Kilimanjaro's Kibo cone is dormant and could erupt again, but its other cones, Mawenzi and Shira, are extinct.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: How long does it take on average to climb to the top?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Climbing to the top of Mount Kilimanjaro usually takes between five to nine days, depending on the route and pace.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Can you climb it year round?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Yes, you can climb Mount Kilimanjaro year-round, but the best times are during the dry seasons from late June to October and from late December to February.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: How many have died trying?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: While exact numbers vary, it's estimated that around 10 climbers die on Mount Kilimanjaro each year.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Do you have to pay to try to climb it?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Yes, you need to pay a fee, as Mount Kilimanjaro is part of a national park managed by the Tanzania National Parks Authority.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I didn't realize it was a national park

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Yes, it's part of the Kilimanjaro National Park and is a major climbing destination.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Is there others things to do at the bottom of the mountain?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Yes, the base of Mount Kilimanjaro offers various activities, including exploring the rich wildlife and scenic landscapes of Kilimanjaro National Park.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Sounds like so much fun

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely, the base of Kilimanjaro offers plenty of fun, including exploring its beautiful national park and observing the fascinating wildlife!
